edu.iit.ir.simpledm.preprocess
Class DataSet

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.iit.ir.simpledm.preprocess.DataSet
public class DataSet
extends java.lang.Object

Contains general data information such as relation name, the number of attributes and number of instances. Also has the array of Attribute.
